title: no longer emit instructions for constants
body_html:
Constant nodes are pooled to the beginning of the graph in the preprocessing stage. Their ivalues are written to a constants array in the Code object. At the beginning of a function call, those values are copied into the interpreter's registers.

A separate diff will be published to no longer print out constant nodes and print their ivalues inline.

body:
Constant nodes are pooled to the beginning of the graph in the preprocessing stage. Their ivalues are written to a constants array in the Code object. At the beginning of a function call, those values are copied into the interpreter's registers.

A separate diff will be published to no longer print out constant nodes and print their ivalues inline.
